summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Epstein. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, communicates with colleagues about the logistics of transferring assets to Pershing LLC. The email includes details about the assets being transferred and requests for necessary information to facilitate the transaction.
